name: DTDA World - Beyond the Board
description:
DTDA World allows you to discover a poetic world and card-games like:

  •  Apogee (1 player): https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/309319/apogee
  • Light Hunters (2 players): https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/225908/light-hunters-battalion-darkness
